sentences.english: Zhao Min is a Chinese girl.
sentences.chinese: 趙敏是一箇中國女孩，她今年13歲。

sentences.english: Britain will strictly abide by the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 英方將恪守一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: Joint Communiqués on its support of the one China policy.
sentences.chinese: 我們讚賞美國一貫表示支持一箇中國的政策。

sentences.english: Li expressed his appreciations for Vanuatu's stance of adhering to the one-China principle.
sentences.chinese: 曾慶紅對瑙魯堅持一箇中國政策表示讚賞。

sentences.english: He also reiterated that his country would continuously stick to the One China policy.
sentences.chinese: 羅普還重申斯將繼續堅持一箇中國的原則。

sentences.english: I'm going to buy some story-books and a Chinese-English and English-Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我要去買些故事書和一箇中國的英國和英漢語詞典。

sentences.english: Of course, for every China bull, there is a bear.
sentences.chinese: 當然，每一箇中國牛市，都會有一個熊市伴隨。

sentences.english: The Sri Lankan government will as always adhere to the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 斯政府將一如既往地堅持一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: Any question can be discussed under the One-China Principle .
sentences.chinese: 在一箇中國原則下，什麼問題都可以談。

sentences.english: He led a six-nation survey this year on media use in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 今年他在一箇中東媒體上對六個國家開啓了一次調查。

sentences.english: Reiterating that the Australian government will firmly pursue the one-China policy, Howard said he fully agrees to the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞政府堅定奉行一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: Kazakhstan firmly supports the one-China policy and the Chinese Anti-Secession Law.
sentences.chinese: 哈方堅定支持一箇中國政策和中國《反分裂國家法》。

sentences.english: This festival descends from  a Chinese rite.
sentences.chinese: 這個節日源自一箇中國的儀式。

sentences.english: It is a little man made of china.
sentences.chinese: 這儲錢罐是一箇中國製造的小男人。

sentences.english: He reaffirmed that his country firmly pursues the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 他重申，斯里蘭卡堅定地奉行一箇中國的政策。

sentences.english: A Chinese student, Li Hong, will soon graduate from college.
sentences.chinese: 一箇中國學生李紅不久就要大學畢業了。

definition: to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
to be versed in/to know well
tassel/sth shaped like a tassel (e.g. a leaf etc)/ribbon
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
